title: Influencer collaboration
description: Co-create unique satellite stores for each influencer you work with and pay them automatically per sale generated with 100% attribution and creative control.

title: Paid Social channels
description: Drive mobile traffic from social media apps to satellite stores with immersive, app-like UX to keep your audience engaged.

title: Affiliate channels
description: Sell directly within affiliate partners' native experiences for higher conversion and pay them automatically per sale generated without attribution problems.
